name: Cushioned Embrace
statusText: Ancilla's perfumed pussy has intoxicated your mind.
outcome: [AttackerName] positions her heels under the head of [TargetName] and presses the adventurer's face forward, forcing [TargetHimOrHer] to breathe in the scent of her ass as it mingles with her perfume before loosening her grasp.
miss: [AttackerName] tries to tuck her heel under the head of [TargetName], but can't find a good angle.
statusOutcome: [TargetName] is hopelessly aroused by the mere scent of [AttackerName].
